name: Skies Of Fire - iOS, Android, Windows (Canceled)
blurb: A 2.5D fast paced action shooter for iOS, Android and Windows phones & tablets.

rewards.reward: Appear as a backer in the game credits.\r\n\r\nA big thanks from us here at WAR Interactive!

Receive a copy of the game on your preferred device and be credited in the game as a backer. \r\n=========================== \r\nAccess Private Developer section of the WAR-Interactive.com forums and a personalised thank you email

=========================== 
Receive credits in the game under the ‘Special Thanks’ section, appearing before the ‘Backers’ credits

-Developing a game- 
1 hour Skype call to talk about any aspect of the development process or about how we developed specific things within the game (Art/Programming/Design etc). If applicable to the request, the request can be demonstrated live via screenshare. Some examples can be: how a spawn point system is made (programming), how to keep track of alive and dead enemies and recycle dead characters (programming) or tips and tricks on modelling and texturing low poly characters (art), all with live demonstrations.   
=========================== 
Design a mini-game: Taking into account the game mechanics/engine, get as creative as you want and design a mini-game. Send your designs to us via e-mail or tell us live on Skype. 
===========================

- Write the entire storyline -  
Want to see your storyline in the game? Write the entire campaign storyline yourself or a general outline that we can work off if you prefer. (Story must be appropriate enough to be approved by Apple/Google/Microsoft)
